summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5921 for the improvement of 47th Avenue South, from approximately 120 feet north of Snoqualmie Street to Genesee Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 78237, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
